title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 79.14 - Transition Period
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 79.14 - Transition Period

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other applicable federal or state law or
rule, for one hundred and twenty (120) days including and following the March
5, 2020 effective date of this Part, mortgagees either originating or servicing
R PL 280 -b loans shall not be in violation of this Part if they comply with
the Part 79 that was in effect prior to March 5, 2020. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
79.14

Adopted

New

York State Register July 29, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 30, eff. 7/29/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
